text: @SpeakerPelosi @SquawkStreet You are a corrupt piece of sh*t.   COVID-19 was used AS A POLITICAL WEAPON.  We are DISPENSABLE to them.  ALL of us.  LIBS...THEY MOCK YOU...THEY USE YOU SO YOU KEEP THEIR CORRPT BUTTS IN POWER.  Rebulicans...THEY HATE US....WITH A PASSION. FU Pelosi
